page.title: 11 LIFE STYLES I
page.content: Cannock provides a wide range of restaurants & hotels catering for all tastes. eg The Royal Oak Hotel provides evening meals and Sunday family lunches. A number of Indian restaurants allow the people of Cannock to sample exotic cuisine.One of Cannock's oldest houses has of recently been converted to the Longford House Carvery and Longford House Carvery. There are a number of amusement arcades and Bingo Halls in Cannock. The former favoured by young people and the latter by the older generation. Younger children occupy there spare time by participiting in out of school activities.
